projects.title: Skillet Data Analytics: Information management system for restaurant data
projects.bodyText:
*Jan - Jun 2022*

- Worked with a team of 4 for a sponsored project by Skillet Restaurant Group.
 - Creating a database system that stores data and transfers to Skillet's new analytics dashboard.
 - I created **SQL queries** and worked on creating landing page with **React**

projects.title: Zone App - meditation and mood-tracking app
projects.bodyText:
*Spring 2022*

- An iOS App that helps users meditate and track their mood.
 - We ideated and fulfilled 5-10 user stories and presented our app to our class and guest software engineers who are iOS software developers.
 - Worked on the history data and calendar interface.

projects.title: Food Cycle -  Food waste prevention app
projects.bodyText:
*Fall 2021*

- Worked with a team of 5. Created a web app that helps users waste less food with a range of options.
 - Used mockups and style guides, prototypes, specifications, wireframes, research, usability testing and consumer feedback.
 - Gave a presentation to advocate for the UN's Sustainability Development Goals and our brand design rationale.

projects.title: Housing Prices Analysis
projects.bodyText:
*Fall 2019*

- Teamed with 3 students to create data analysis of current housing prices to help people looking to live in the Seattle Area.
 - User Interface and analyses coded in R and Shiny.

projects.title: Drink Choices 2.0
projects.bodyText:
*Spring 2020*

- Worked in a team of 4 to develop an app to help users choose a drink to fit their mood and other features.
 - Uses Firebase realtime database to store user interactions.
 - Option to select a random drink

projects.title: Drink Choices
projects.bodyText:
*Spring 2020*

- First iteration of the app, partnered with only one other person at the time.

projects.title: Music Festival Database
projects.bodyText:
*Winter 2021*

- Teamed with 2 students to develop a database solution to address a business problem. 
 - Used Microsoft SQL Server to create a database, business rules, and computed columns for Music Festival events.

projects.title: Hate Crime Analysis
projects.bodyText:
*Spring 2021*

- Worked on a Jupyter notebook for the purpose of analyzing a hate crime dataset.
 - Used python and tableau to analyze the data.

projects.title: Software Systems Analysis
projects.bodyText:
*Winter 2022*

- Worked with 3 students to analyze an existing large-size software system, which we chose the FirebaseUI Web software.
 - In our report, we documented the system's architecture from multiple viewpoints, identified styles and patterns used, and assessed the architectural quality and areas of improvement in regard to design principles.

projects.title: 'Drink Choices' Systems Analysis
projects.bodyText:
*Winter 2022*

- My examination of an existing software system that I am familiar with, which I chose the Drink Choices app created in my 340 class.
 - I was expected to describe the architecture and identify areas of improvement for the code, refactor the code, and produce unit tests while retaining the current functionality.
 - Unfortunately, due to the challenges I faced working with different versions of firebase and uncertain guidance from my instructor, I was not able to produce working unit tests.
